title: Human Insect

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Send your flies to devour someone. If they have a factional chat or Conversion Immunity, attack them. Otherwise, their role changes to **Crawling**
-Once there are at least 3 Crawlings alive, choose to appease your insects. If you do, sacrifice all alive Crawlings (killing them) and turn into **Insect Abomination**

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -In addition to your night ability, you may redirect one Crawling of your choice to another player of your choice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you

desc:
Post 2319
Warning do not open spoilertext if uncomfy with bug stuff/gore
*Do you feel the pain...? The pain of ||a million bugs slowly tearing your skin apart with slow bites, crawling under your skin?||*
